sentences.en: A hundred years after Confucius died, Mencius taught and expanded Confucian doctrine.
sentences.cn: 孔子去世100年后, 孟子传授并阐发了孔子的学说.

sentences.en: He erected a new doctrine of precedent.
sentences.cn: 他创立了一套新的判例原则。

sentences.en: He preached a doctrine which was new to him.
sentences.cn: 他对教义的解释一改旧貌.

sentences.en: However, this due process doctrine has its critics.
sentences.cn: 但不管怎样, 这一正当程序理论受到一些批评家的非议.

sentences.en: It's the end of the doctrine in all but name.
sentences.cn: 这实际上已是该学说的终结，只是未被道明罢了。

sentences.en: The delegation doctrine remains available to use in truly extreme cases.
sentences.cn: 在真正极端的案子里仍可使用授权理论.

sentences.en: The doctrine of surplus value is the cornerstone of Marx's economic theory.
sentences.cn: 剩余价值学说是马克思经济理论的基石.

sentences.en: The doctrine of uniform circular motion became embedded in Greek thought.
sentences.cn: 匀速圆周运动的信念已深入希腊人的思想中.

sentences.en: The doctrine was based on three fundamental principles.
sentences.cn: 这个学说建立在三条基本原理之上。

sentences.en: The document expressed some ambivalence over the doctrine of predestination.
sentences.cn: 这份文献显示出对宿命论的某些矛盾观点.

sentences.en: The implied - reservation doctrine has deep historical roots.
sentences.cn: 所指的保留地原则有着很深的历史渊源.

sentences.en: This doctrine, I am afraid, is at present carried much too far.
sentences.cn: 这套说法目前恐怕宣扬得太过火了.

sentences.en: This satirical address was a thinly disguised stricture against the doctrine of the rights of man.
sentences.cn: 这一充满讽刺意味的演说几乎是对人权主义不加掩饰的指责.

sentences.en: We strongly disagree with the doctrine of hedonism.
sentences.cn: 我们强烈反对享乐主义学说。

phrases.tran_cn: 门罗主义；类似门罗主义的策略

trans.tran_cn: 信条，教义，学说，正式声明
trans.tran_en: a set of beliefs that form an important part of a religion or system of ideas
